comments: Very inconsistent with syllabus and lecturing. Hard to follow and unhelpful.

Project guidelines aren\'t clear but have fun with it, it isn\'t too bad. Easy grading, very enthusiastic. If you want to learn a lot, you have to try and teach yourself the concepts. Or, you can leave the class with an A and not understand a thing about Probs and Stats. Antler is a great teacher if you want to learn.
This class was in a relaxed atmosphere. As long as you read the book, youre fine.

very straightforward. lays out what he\'ll be covering and gives numerous examples mimicking his exam questions. he leaves it up to you to come prepared with questions if you don\'t understand something. i\'d take him again.

This is the worst instructor I\'ve ever had. His lectures are very unorganized and he does not explain things very well. I understand the book, which he doesn\'t really use, more so than his lectures and tests.

Awful teacher! Very unorganized. Has no structure to class. Does not explain material. I have looked to youtube to learn the concepts. After looking on youtube I learned the that material is not very complicated. I would tell you not to take his class but he is the only one that teaches it.
Doesn\'t teach the material neccessary to pass the class. He is too consumed with Obama.
